item.description: Saturday night, February 6th, you can catch us at the Stonebridge Restaurant, located at 50 Daniel St. in downtown Milford, CT, their phone: (203) 874-7947. It's been a couple years since we've last played here, we're usually at their sister venue across the street...we decided to try something different, do a little more intimate show in a restaurant type setting. The Stonebridge is well known for their great food, serving a nice mix of classic American seafood and steak dishes in an upscale atmosphere...later in the evening the vibe does get quite a bit more lively...great place for a night out, nice dinner and some dancing to some good 'ol school grooves!!! Showtime kicks off at 9:30...reservations recommended if you hope to get a table, in the past we've really packed them in here! For directions and info, visit their website at: http://www.stonebridg...

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Bernadette's @ Stonebridge
